Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Scapularisin-6 (defensin; natural AMPs; ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: 82% similar toAP713.Activity: Active against fungi F. culmorum and F. graminearum at IC50 1-2 uM and Gram+ bacteria L. grayi, but not S.aureus, S.epidermidis and seven Listeria spp., and the Gram- bacteria E.coli and P.aeruginosa. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Tonk M, Cabezas-Cruz A, Valdés JJ, Rego R, Chrudimská T, Strnad M, Íma R, Bell-Sakyi L, Franta ZK, Vilcinskas A, Grubhoffer L, Rahnamaeian M.2014
Literature Information.Title: Defensins from the tick Ixodes scapularis are effective against phytopathogenic fungi and the human bacterial pathogen Listeria grayi.
